question: As a member of our diabetes community, you have valuable insights to offer about the topics that matter to you most. We’re looking for people to answer a few questions about diabetes information and advice. There are no right or wrong answers — we're just looking for honest responses. Your personal information and opinions will be kept confidential and used for internal purposes only.If you’re interested, take the 1-2 minute survey below. We may ask to do a follow-up interview with you (via Skype/Google/Facetime video chat). Those selected will receive a $50 Amazon gift card for their participation.Copy and paste this URL into your web browser to answer: https://http://www.medhelp.org.typeform.com/to/Y83264Thank you!The Team at MedHelp
title: Title: Share What Diabetes Topics Matter to You — $50 gift card!
